title: Best Bits with Morgan and Special Guest Raymundo: PART 1
itunes:title: Best Bits with Morgan and Special Guest Raymundo: PART 1
description:
The Best Bits podcast is now officially separated into two podcasts!! This part of the podcast is the version you all have been wanting as a stand-alone, Morgan and a guest having their in-depth conversations without any interruptions. In this podcast you’ll hear Morgan and Raymundo talk about the best food chains, Nashville recommendations, their favorite songs right now, updates on their pets, and the comedians they want to see in person one day. Raymundo shared a fun country music secret and a recent story about a fake hair salon. Morgan talked about her love for Shania Twain and something that happened at a bar.

 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
